title: Accord, NY: A ‘Laid-Back Agricultural Hub’ With a ‘Chill Vibe’
description: With its central location, stunning scenery and culturally diverse community, the Ulster County hamlet has seen an influx of residents in recent years.
dc:creator: Karen Angel
media:credit: Lauren Lancaster for The New York Times
media:description: The upscale resort Inness added a touch of glamour to Accord when it opened last year.
